ch0259_40_sania/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Are you about to head out?
ch0259_40_sania/0101_0701_02_10:
Maybe I’ll come with you. I’ve been wanting to
observe more sync pairs!
ch0259_40_sania/7101_0701_01_10:
This is such a pretty outfit, but it feels a little odd
because I’m so used to just wearing my lab coat.
ch0259_40_sania/7101_0701_02_10:
Nessa says it looks good on me, but I don’t
know. I just can’t relax in this!
ch0259_40_sania/7102_0701_01_10:
When I wear this outfit around town, people keep
smiling and calling me “Your Majesty!”
ch0259_40_sania/7102_0701_02_10:
It’s a fun new feeling, but I’m not sure how to
respond... What do you say back to that?
ch0259_40_sania/7103_0701_01_10:
When I showed this outfit to Nessa, she asked me
if I wanted to model with her!
ch0259_40_sania/7103_0701_02_10:
That got me thinking—it really would be fun if I
could work together with Nessa, don’t you think?
ch0259_40_sania/7104_0701_01_10:
Don’t you think my partner Tsareena and I look
perfect together right now, since I’m wearing this
queen outfit?
ch0259_40_sania/7104_0701_02_10:
Tsareena’s a really strong-willed Pokémon. She
shows no mercy to the opponents she’s defeated.
ch0259_40_sania/7104_0701_03_10:
She must have a lot of self-confidence. I hope I
can learn some of that from her.
ch0259_40_sania/7105_0701_01_10:
Look how long and strong Tsareena’s legs are!
I really admire them!
ch0259_40_sania/7105_0701_02_10:
Not many Pokémon have legs as strong as hers,
either! That’s what makes her special!
ch0259_40_sania/7105_0701_03_10:
Every Pokémon has a part of it that makes it
special, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You've just
got to look and see!
ch0259_40_sania/1701_0701_01_10: Here, I’ve got a present for you!
ch0259_40_sania/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s up to you how you want to use it. Be sure to
tell me how it goes!
ch0259_40_sania/2501_0701_01_10:
Hey, listen to this! What do you think
Hop said when he was talking to me
and Tsareena earlier?
ch0259_40_sania/2501_0701_03_10:
I mean, I know it’s because I’m wearing
this outfit...
ch0259_40_sania/2501_0701_04_10:
Even dressed up like a queen, I really am
the same kind and understanding person...or at
least I try to be!
ch0259_40_sania/2501_0702_01_10:
Hop calling me “Your Majesty” makes me worry
that I’ve been too strict with him lately
or something...
ch0259_40_sania/2501_0702_02_10: I don’t think I have been... Have I?
ch0259_40_sania/2511_0701_01_10:
A lot of fairy tales feature a queen who’s kind of
scary. You know what I’m talking about, right?
ch0259_40_sania/2511_0701_02_10:
The ones who think they’re better than
everyone else, and if you disagree with them,
awful things happen.
ch0259_40_sania/2511_0701_03_10:
Queens should be working to protect
their countries, not terrorize them!
ch0259_40_sania/2511_0702_01_10:
The truth of what actually happened in history can
get muddled after so much time has passed.
ch0259_40_sania/2511_0702_02_10: The legends of Galar are the same way.
ch0259_40_sania/2511_0702_03_10:
All we can do is try to figure out what happened
based on the remaining clues and our
own imaginations.
ch0259_40_sania/2511_0702_04_10:
By the way, if you’re ever curious about the
legends of Galar, I recommend my book!
ch0259_40_sania/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Let’s give it our all out there today!
And no matter what, stay positive!
ch0259_40_sania/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey! Don’t think I didn’t see you dozing off
earlier, sleepyhead. Come on, the day’s just
getting started!
ch0259_40_sania/3005_0701_01_10:
Are you still planning on running around even
after dark? Well, just watch your step, all right?
Stay sharp!
